text: "You're the First Time I've Thought About Leaving" is a 1983 song by country singer Reba McEntire and is the third single from her fifth studio album Unlimited. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 5 on Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Country songs Category:Reba McEntire songs
title: You're the First Time I've Thought About Leaving
